description: Definitely one of the most reliable restaurants in this area, Vibo Valentia Marina overlooks Vibo Marina port and is the perfect choice for anyone keen on classic Mediterranean cuisine with a focus on fish (most of which is caught locally), although meat dishes also feature on the menu. The restaurant also offers guestrooms in its Cala del Porto hotel.
